column4: Microsoft's Hotmail and Outlook.com suffer all-day outage in Europe
column5: FRANKFURT  Sept 18 Microsoft's free email services Outlook.com and Hotmail suffered an outage across Europe on Monday  preventing users from sending and receiving emails for 12 hours.

column4: Intel collaborates with Waymo on self-driving computer design
column5: SAN FRANCISCO Intel Corp  on Monday announced a collaboration with Alphabet's  Waymo self-driving unit  saying it had worked with the company during the design of its computer platform to allow autonomous cars to process information in real time.
